item.title: [Omdia Webinar] Ten Big Questions and Answers About the Games Industry in 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamedeveloper.com/business/ten-big-questions-and-answers-about-the-games-industry-in-2025

[Omdia Webinar] Ten Big Questions and Answers About the Games Industry in 2025[Omdia Webinar] Ten Big Questions and Answers About the Games Industry in 2025

View this Omdia on-demand webinar and get the answers the most pressing questions facing the gaming industry in 2025.

Omdia's team of expert games analysts ran a webinar on Tuesday, March 11, 2025, providing the perfect preparation for GDC 2025 by leveraging their peerless data and insights to answer the most pressing questions facing the gaming industry in 2025.
Key questions and topics included:

  • Will the games industry 'survive in 25'? 

  • How will the release of Switch 2 affect the console and handhelds landscape?

  • Where will AI have the biggest impact in the games value chain?
